name: Entire Apt near transit/free parking/self check-in
description:
Entire apartment, no sharing space with other guests. Comfortable, clean apartment in the quiet Boston neighborhood of Hyde Park. Convenient location, near MBTA purple line Fairmount station. The apartment is on the second floor of a smoke-free multi-family home. Bright and cozy bedroom with a queen size bed, a comfortable living room with full size convertible sofa bed, comes with private kitchen and bathroom; free parking, keyless self check-in. Also enjoy fast Gig speed Internet in the house.

The space
Easy access to downtown Boston, 5-7 minute walk to the Fairmount train stop, Fairmount is Commuter Rail Zone 1A station, it takes about 25 minutes to get to downtown South Station, if you have a 1-day, 7-day or monthly LinkPass CharlieTicket, it is valid at Fairmount station, monthly Pass costs $90, you can also pay cash on the train, the fare of $2.40 per ride. If you drive, it takes 25 minutes to downtown Boston when there is no heavy traffic. Bus #24 stop
